I am sorry that I missed a spoken statement from Professor Hazel Sive at 5:57  She said that H = Total energy or enthalpy.
at 6:43  H should be Total Enthalpy instead of Total Energy By definition,  H = U + PV   where U = Total internal Energy, P = pressure and V = volume  so PV is a correction factor
Must not listen to eraser! ARGH. Use WHITEBOARDS people!
douglas yiu  I know this is old, but we are assuming this happens in the blood, so PV is neglagible as volume and pressure is almost constant in healthy cells.
